original_text: So, if we have enough food and clothes, we should be happy with that.
korean_text: 우리가 먹을 것과 입을 것이 있은즉 족한 줄로 알 것이니라

sentences.original_text: So, if we have enough food and clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리가 먹을 것과 입을 것이 있으면

sentences.original_text: we should be happy with that
